name.ja: <ruby>見えざる手<rt>ヘカトンケイル</rt></ruby>ブレアス
name.zh-CN: 百臂无形手 布瑞撕

text.en: If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Hecatoncheire Breus" once per turn. If a card(s) is added to your opponent's hand, except during the Draw Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can look at 1 random card in your opponent's hand, and if it is a monster, you can Special Summon it to your field.
